bioconda.name: crossmap
bioconda.summary: CrossMap is a program for convenient conversion of genome coordinates and genomeannotation files between assemblies.

biocontainers.name: crossmap
biocontainers.summary: Crossmap is a program for convenient conversion of genome coordinates and genomeannotation files between assemblies.

biotools.summary: An efficient tool for converting genome coordinates between assemblies. CrossMap supports most of the commonly used file formats, including BAM, sequence alignment map, Wiggle, BigWig, browser extensible data, general feature format, gene transfer format and variant call format.

bioschemas.name: CrossMap
bioschemas.summary: An efficient tool for converting genome coordinates between assemblies. CrossMap supports most of the commonly used file formats, including BAM, sequence alignment map, Wiggle, BigWig, browser extensible data, general feature format, gene transfer format and variant call format.
